text: Tower Hamlets Local Plan 351 MOVEMENT AND CONNECTIVITY 19.28 This policy embeds the councilâ€™s road user hierarchy, which prioritises walking and cycling, then public transport use, as sustainable modes of travel, followed by all other modes of motorised transport. 19.29 Part 1 of this policy requires development proposals to improve the quality and connectivity of walking, wheeling, and cycling routes in the area. Development proposals are required to demonstrate how they have applied the Healthy Streets Approach as set out in the London Plan as part of the transport assessment.
